Compliance description: Check if the code includes methods to collect raw data from databases, APIs, sensors, web scraping, or user inputs.
Assess if the code includes an annotation system for supervised learning tasks, such as manual or automated labeling.
Verify if the code maintains structured metadata, including source details, timestamps, and schema definitions.
Ensure that the code implements dataset versioning to track different versions for reproducibility and rollback capabilities.
Assess if the code includes proper logic to train the selected model on the dataset.
Verify if the code serializes the trained model into a deployable format (e.g., Pickle, ONNX, TensorFlow SavedModel).
Check if the code logs hyperparameters, metrics, and model configurations for reproducibility.
Verify if the code stores models in a registry like MLflow or ModelDB for version control.
Ensure the code maintains logs of predictions, failures, and user feedback for debugging.
